# JSONEncoder.KeyEncodingStrategy.useDefaultKeys

**Case**

A key encoding strategy that doesn’t change key names during encoding.

## Declaration

```swift
case useDefaultKeys
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONEncoder/KeyEncodingStrategy-swift.enum/useDefaultKeys] strategy is the strategy used if you don’t specify one.



## Built-in Encoding

- **JSONEncoder.KeyEncodingStrategy.convertToSnakeCase**: A key encoding strategy that converts camel-case keys to snake-case keys.

items.description: A key encoding strategy that converts camel-case keys to snake-case keys.
